d:
Hey All, welcome to Bartoon's Recurve! This is a future world where plastic poisoning has caused the population to become 90% men. After a global war, a pacification and new government establishment, science created a medical breakthrough! They could fix the population imbalance! The plan is to roll-out to the entire world, but first, they need to propogandize everyone. And the gov found their representative in Layton/Laysee!

I present Chapter 2: Champions.

In Champions, Layton and his team have won the championship and are celebrating the way they do!
